description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models:An electromechanical device that operates with shaft rotating synchronously with the network. It is a single machine operating either as a generator or synchronous condenser or pump.

contents.name: smName
contents.description: The name of the synchronous machine.

contents.name: maxQ
contents.description: Maximum reactive power limit. This is the maximum (nameplate) limit for the unit. Default: 0.0

contents.name: minQ
contents.description: Minimum reactive power limit for the unit. Default: 0.0

contents.name: r
contents.description: Equivalent resistance (RG) of generator. RG is considered for the calculation of all currents, except for the calculation of the peak current ip. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

contents.name: voltageRegulationRange
contents.description: Range of generator voltage regulation (PG in the IEC 60909-0) used for calculation of the impedance correction factor KG defined in IEC 60909-0 This attribute is used to describe the operating voltage of the generating unit. Default: 0.0

contents.name: MemberOf_GeneratingUnit
contents.description: The relationship between a synchronous machine to a generating nit

contents.name: MemberOf_EquipmentContainer
contents.description: A synchronous machine can be associated to an equipment container via the same voltage level.
